code:
[BEGIN]
module TopModule (
    input logic in,              // 1-bit input signal
    input logic [3:0] state,     // 4-bit input representing the current state (one-hot encoded)
    output logic [3:0] next_state,// 4-bit output representing the next state (one-hot encoded)
    output logic out             // 1-bit output signal
);

always @(*) begin
    case (state)
        4'b0001: next_state = (in) ? 4'b0010 : 4'b0001; // State A
        4'b0010: next_state = (in) ? 4'b0010 : 4'b0100; // State B
        4'b0100: next_state = (in) ? 4'b1000 : 4'b0001; // State C
        4'b1000: next_state = (in) ? 4'b0010 : 4'b0100; // State D
        default: next_state = 4'b0001; // Default to State A
    endcase
end

always @(*) begin
    out = (state == 4'b1000 && in) ? 1'b1 : 1'b0; // Output logic
end

endmodule
[DONE]

iterations.code:
module TopModule (
    input logic in,              // 1-bit input signal
    input logic [3:0] state,     // 4-bit input representing the current state (one-hot encoded)
    output logic [3:0] next_state,// 4-bit output representing the next state (one-hot encoded)
    output logic out             // 1-bit output signal
);

assign next_state = (state[0] && !in) ? 4'b0001 : // State A, in=0 -> Stay in A
                    (state[0] && in) ? 4'b0010 : // State A, in=1 -> Go to B
                    (state[1] && !in) ? 4'b0100 : // State B, in=0 -> Go to C
                    (state[1] && in) ? 4'b0010 : // State B, in=1 -> Stay in B
                    (state[2] && !in) ? 4'b0001 : // State C, in=0 -> Go to A
                    (state[2] && in) ? 4'b1000 : // State C, in=1 -> Go to D
                    (state[3] && !in) ? 4'b0100 : // State D, in=0 -> Go to C
                    (state[3] && in) ? 4'b0010 : // State D, in=1 -> Go to B
                    4'b0001; // Default case, maintain current state

assign out = (state[3] && in) ? 1'b1 : // State D, in=1 -> Output 1
            1'b0; // All other states -> Output 0

endmodule
